moscow, february 15th, 2024 dear mr. tardif, we, the players of the russia men's national junior ice hockey team, do not understand what is happening to world ice hockey. our team missed three world junior championships. in 2022, we were not allowed to finish the tournament, which was canceled due to covid-19. in 2023 and 2024, russia did not play because of security concerns ~ that's the reason the –ø–Ω–µ outlined for the ban. for the same reason the —à–Ω–µ suspended the israel men's national junior ice hockey team from its competition. this happened on january 11, 2024. only six days later the –ø–Ω–µ decided to-bring back the israel team. we would like to know what had happened during those six days? had the conflict inithe middle east come to an end? had the security concerns been resolved in –∞ short time? we would like to ask you: in what way we, the guys born in 2003-2005, have offended the world ice hockey? why does the –ø–Ω–µ rigorously exclude us from world hockey, making its own-events (including future men's national teams` events) less competitive? ifthe problem is notionly about safety, we would like to ask the –ø–Ω–µ to state it directly, aloud, to the whole world. why else would you lift one national team's suspension in six days and isolate another one for years? why does another organization, the national hockey league (nhl), welcome hockey players from all countries to join its clubs? lt proudly reports records, praises, and promotes the play of dozens offour compatriots, not hesitating to say what country they come from. why-are the clubs of the kontinental hockey league (–∫–Ω–µ , despite the difficult political situation, happy to have hockey players from all countries in their rosters? our joint letter addressed to-the international ice hockey federation is –∞ cry of the heart. we-will —Å–æ—Ä–µ with any difficulties, and we-still become professionals despite any decisions. but we want to know-the truth, to be able to have an-honest, open dialog within the world hockey family. russia men's national junior ice hockey team players:
